text: Paul Clammer is an English travel writer best known for books on challenging destinations including Haiti, Sudan and Afghanistan. Clammer is the co-author of several guide books for Lonely Planet and the founder of Kabul Caravan,http://www.afghanscene.com/pdfs/asmaug.pdf a highly respected website focussing on helping travellers visit Afghanistan. Clammer attended St Ivo School, Cambridgeshire and Bristol University. ==References== Category:Living people Category:English travel writers Category:People educated at St Ivo School Category:English male non-fiction writers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Paul Clammer
